thumb]]: Headington]] was the home of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Edith Tolkien]] from [[30 March]] [[1953]] until mid-July [[1968]].<ref>{{CG
column3: RG}}, pp. 696-8</ref> Currently a plaque sits above the door stating that the Professor lived there once.

[[Image:76 Sandfield Road.jpg: * Sandfield road is a bit out of the centre of Oxford Coming from High Street after the roundabout, head to Headington Road and turn halfway left to Hadley Way. You will have to look at the right side, just before the first roundabout.
